title: Another Boston Herald news header, now from the 60s
content:
Can't seem to get this, I want that R. Extra points for naming all the other fonts on the page :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018061550im_/http:/typophile.com/files/boston2_4381.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018061550im_/http:/typophile.com/files/boston3_5769.jpg)
author: fruktbart

comments.content:
'The Boston Herald' looks very similar to Century No. 1 SB, but unfortunately it is not what you need.  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/century-no1-sb/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018061550/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/century-no1-sb/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/century-no1-sb/")
